hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.subtitle: We're here to answer your questions and help you begin your healing journey

introduction.text: Have questions about Traditional Chinese Medicine or ready to schedule your first appointment? We'd love to hear from you. Reach out by phone, email, or use the form below.

hours.title: Hours of Operation
hours.note: Last appointment starts 1 hour before closing. Please call ahead for same-day appointments.

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.subtitle: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Tell us how we can help you...

form.successMessage: Thank you for contacting us! We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
form.errorMessage: Sorry, there was an error sending your message. Please try calling us directly at (845) 381-1106.

map.title: Find Us
map.directions: We're located on East Main Street in downtown Middletown, easily accessible from Route 211 and I-84. Free street parking is available, as well as a public parking lot behind our building.

emergency.title: Medical Emergency?
emergency.message: If you're experiencing a medical emergency, please call 911 or visit your nearest emergency room immediately.

items.question: Do I need an appointment?
items.answer: Yes, we see patients by appointment only. This ensures you receive our full attention and there's minimal wait time. Call us or use the form above to schedule.

items.question: Do you accept walk-ins?
items.answer: We occasionally have same-day appointments available. Please call ahead to check availability rather than walking in.

items.question: How do I prepare for my first visit?
items.answer: Please arrive 10 minutes early to complete paperwork (or download forms from our New Patients page). Eat a light meal 1-2 hours before, wear comfortable clothing, and bring a list of any medications you're taking.

items.question: Do you offer free consultations?
items.answer: We offer a brief phone consultation (10-15 minutes) at no charge to answer questions and determine if TCM is right for you. Full in-person consultations include treatment and are billed at our initial visit rate.
